item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, I’m daffa shafwan -> shaf - ware engineer Background A software engineer, especially do backend. Currently using go as main programming language. also learning bionformatics Interests Backend Engineering Bioinformatics Engineering Large Language Model Skills Web Programming (Go, Java, PHP, Python, and Ruby) Machine Learning and Deep Learning Data Analytics and Visualization Education Informatics, University of Muhammadiyah Malang Experience PT Global Tiket Network (tiket.com) Software Engineer - fulltime (2023 - now) Backend Engineer - intern (2022 - 2023) PT Sekawan Media Informatika Backend Engineer - intern (August 2021 - November 2021) Yayasan LBM Al Falah Sragen (smartlbm) Fullstack Engineer (Janury 2021 - December 2021) UMM Informatics Laboratory Laboratory Teaching Assistant (September 2019 - January 2022) Contact Me You can reach me via email at dev.
